thread.title: Dow drops 1000+ points, now in correction territory

title: Dow drops 1000+ points, now in correction territory
text:
Dow drops 1000+ points, now in correction territory Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:55 
U.S. stocks plunged anew on Thursday in another trading session with big swings, as equities remained in a tug-of-war with bond yields, volatility remained high, and investors saw no relief ahead in finding the bottom of the market. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
